setting.query: select $COLUMNS$,(select COUNT(1) from tbl_followups where followups_module='enquiry' and followups_mid=enquiry_enquiryid and followups_followupactionid in(6,7,9)) as Visits, (select COUNT(1) from tbl_followups where followups_module='enquiry' and followups_mid=enquiry_enquiryid and followups_followupactionid =1) as Calls, (select COUNT(1) from tbl_followups where followups_module='enquiry' and followups_mid=enquiry_enquiryid and followups_followupactionid =4) as Email from tbl_enquiry left JOIN tbl_client ON client_clientid=enquiry_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_campaign ON campaign_campaignid=enquiry_campaignid left JOIN tbl_enquiryfor ON enquiryfor_enquiryforid=enquiry_enquiryforid LEFT JOIN tbl_designation ON designation_designationid=enquiry_designationid LEFT JOIN tbl_product ON product_productid=enquiry_productid LEFT JOIN tbl_state ON state_stateid=enquiry_stateid LEFT JOIN tbl_area ON area_areaid=enquiry_areaid LEFT JOIN tbl_communicationsource ON communicationsource_communicationsourceid=enquiry_communicationsourceid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON employee_employeeid=enquiry_employeeid LEFT JOIN tbl_enquirystatus ON enquirystatus_enquirystatusid=enquiry_enquirystatusid $Search$
